name: 曾勝茂
objective: 藉由高分子構造與形態、結構與物性相關性，高分子的物性檢驗方法，高分子黏彈性理論推導，高分子流變學與加工特性，而熟悉高分子特性；並同時經由現有高分子加工方法與機械設備，添加劑的功能與使用，高分子複合材料與加工方法的介紹，作為學生進入工業界就業及研究高分子材料的基礎。
schedule:
1.Introduction – Types of polymers, nomenclature, molecular weight, degree of polymerization.
2.Classification of polymerization reactions-step polmerization, chain polymerization
3.Thermodynamics of polymer solutions
4.transition properties-Glass transition temperature, melting temperature
5.mechanical properties and other general properties
6.Boltzman superposition principle. Dynamic mechanical testing.Time-temperature superposition.  WLF equation.
7.Rheology of polymer melt
7.polymer processing - mixing and blending
8.polymer processing - Extrusion
9.polymer processing - injection molding
10. polymer processing - fiber spinning
11.polymer processing - thermoforming, blow molding and others
12. additives for polymer processing
